metadata.title: CVE-2024-42113 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: txgbe: initialize num_q_vectors for MSI/INTx interruptsWhen using MSI/INTx interrupts, wx->num_q_vectors is uninitialized.Thus there will be kernel panic in wx_alloc_q_vectors() to allocatequeue vectors.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
